biotools.summary: MomentClosure.jl is a tool to automatically obtain time-evolution equations of moments up to an arbitrary order for virtually any chemical reaction network implementing a wide array of moment closure approximations commonly used in stochastic biochemical kinetics

bioschemas.name: MomentClosure.jl
bioschemas.summary: MomentClosure.jl is a tool to automatically obtain time-evolution equations of moments up to an arbitrary order for virtually any chemical reaction network implementing a wide array of moment closure approximations commonly used in stochastic biochemical kinetics
